# QR Code Generator

This is a simple web application that generates QR codes based on the input text or URL provided by the user.

## Features

- Allows users to input text or URL.
- Generates a QR code based on the input.
- Displays the generated QR code to the user.

## Technologies Used

- HTML
- CSS
- JavaScript
- QR Code API (https://api.qrserver.com/v1/)

## Usage

1. Clone this repository to your local machine.
2. Open `index.html` in a web browser.
3. Enter the desired text or URL in the input field.
4. Click the "Generate QR code" button.
5. The generated QR code will be displayed below the input field.
